about_the_game:
Experience the Thrill of 16-Bit Shoot-‘Em-Up Action!

Take flight in ZPF, a high-octane shooter that blends horror, sci-fi, and fantasy into a visually stunning 16-bit experience! This exclusive Steam demo lets you command three unique pilots—Knight, Gladius, and Gold—as you battle through three intense stages: The Fantasy World, The Future Megalopolis, and Deep Space. Each level is packed with parallax-scrolling environments, adrenaline-pumping minibosses, and screen-filling bosses, all set to an electrifying chiptune soundtrack.

.

Download the demo now and test your skills!

content_descriptors.notes: Mature content is sporadic, non sexual nudity (only shown on a few screens) and some body horror/gore also shown sporadically.

short_description: ZPF is a retro-inspired horizontal shooter for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive. Blast your way through a cosmic gauntlet of epic boss battles, addictive scoring, and hidden secrets in a thrilling arcade-style adventure. This demo is your first step into the ultimate 16-bit shooter challenge.
